item.title: Custom Fortune Cookie / Random Tips - Open New Terminal
item.description: Those who are tired of reading the same old repetitive fortune cookies, you have come to the right place to learn the magic of configuring dynamic and more useful tips. Prerequisites: Kindly install the following tools from your package manager curl (pull the html page) html-xml-utils (manipulate html content) w3m (display text only from html) Create a Bash Function to pull from your desired website: For educational purposes, I’m picking up https://til.
